GUNBAE

Gunbae is a Korean word that refers to the act of drinking in honor of someone or something.

1 servings 5 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Glasses
  • Soju
  • Beer
  • Kimchi
  • Rice
  • Noodles
  • Vegetables
  • Meat

Ingredients

  • Soju
  • Beer
  • Kimchi
  • Rice
  • Noodles
  • Vegetables
  • Meat

Directions

  1. Pour soju and beer into glasses.

  2. Add kimchi and rice to the glasses.

  3. Add noodles and vegetables to the glasses.

  4. Add meat to the glasses.

  5. Enjoy your gunbae!
